plot: When his father's business fails, a young architect borrows money from his friends and gets his father a job aiding in the construction of a building he designed.
title: Cheongchun hwawon
plot_es: When his father's business fails, a young architect borrows money from his friends and gets his father a job aiding in the construction of a building he designed.
plot_en: When his father's business fails, a young architect borrows money from his friends and gets his father a job aiding in the construction of a building he designed.
